metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3984 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3984` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> for bionic and earlier, the vulnerable function in src/cindent.c is in src/misc1.c.

criterions.comment: vim package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1').
